name: Barcelona Media (Voice and Language group)
body:
### The Voice and Language Group at Barcelona Media

This is the entry page to [BarcelonaMedia-ViL](http://barcelonamedia.org/section/bm-r-d/voice-and-language)'s GitHub repositories.

You will find mostly components for [UIMA](http://uima.apache.org/), e.g.:
* [UIMA wrapper for the DeSR parser](https://github.com/BarcelonaMedia-ViL/desr-uima)
* [UIMA tools for handling collections with MySQL](https://github.com/BarcelonaMedia-ViL/uima-collection-tools)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
